mapper.sql:
from image_inf i
left outer join tag_image a on i.id = a.imageId and a.tagId = #{searchDto.tagId}
left outer join tag_image aa on i.id = aa.imageId inner join tag t on t.id = aa.tagId and t.name like '%${searchDto.tagName}%'
where i.status != 1
mapper.select: select t.name from image_inf i inner join tag_image a on i.id = a.imageId inner join tag t on t.id = a.tagId and t.status != 2 where i.id = #{imageId} order by t.tagOrder
select t.* from image_inf i inner join tag_image a on i.id = a.imageId inner join tag t on t.id = a.tagId and t.status != 2 where i.id = #{imageId} order by t.tagOrder
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tag_image(tagId, imageId, imageOrder) Value (#{tagId}, #{imageId}, #{imageOrder})
